From: One Reach <OneReach@chalhoub.com>
To: 
CC: 
BCC: 
Date: 2025-06-24 12:12
Subject: Weekly Maintenance Activity EBS - 28/06/2025
--------------------------------------------------
 

 <https://onereach.status.freshservice.com/> 

 

Dear Colleague, 

 

To ensure seamless business operations, we have scheduled essential maintenance to enhance the infrastructure on Oracle E-Business Suite systems.

 

 Maintenance start time: Saturday, June 28, 2025, | 06:00 PM (GST)

Maintenance end time:   Saturday, June 28, 2025, | 08:00 PM (GST)

 

Please be aware that during this period, access to Oracle EBS will be temporarily unavailable.


We appreciate your patience and cooperation as we work to enhance your experience with our services.


For support during this period, please raise a ticket via OneReach. You can also check real-time status updates via the Tech&Data System Status & Health <https://onereach.status.freshservice.com/>  Dashboard.

 

 

 

This mail was sent to you by

 <https://onereach.chalhoub.com/support/home>
